BOT: [[User:H3llBot/T2|Checking dead links]]; Added 1 archived Wayback link
Date maintenance tags and general fixes: build 557:

/* Parodies and characters based on Grace */ added some cn tags and removed a bunch of long time citation needed lines. source before you re-add them pls. technically prob only the 1st paragraph should remain due to BLP..but you guys discuss.
/* "Law and Order" connection */ added cn tag
/* Other work */ added a cn tag
/* Other work */ removed dead ref that was from a gossip column.. "word on the street" is not a valid source. pls source with a more reputable source and re-add if necessary
/* Other work */ added cn tags
/* Duke Lacrosse scandal */ added a ref and a cn tag
/* Controversy */ added refs... removed interview with smart..due to undue weight.. its not a controversy..otherwise just about every interview would be on this site.
/* Suicide of interviewee Melinda Duckett */ removed citation needed tag. source at the end of the sentence is the source to what was tagged
